Events.Text: Not again! You took the wrong bus and got totally lost in the middle of the city. But you have to get to your hot date in time! Ask you personal AI assistant for help. [instruction 1 of 5]
Hi, I am lost
The hot date is somewhere near 5th and Main. If you can get there, you should know your way again. [instruction 2 of 5]
mode
Do you want to drive, walk, or use public transit?
I have a really hot date..I am kind of nervous. So I think I should walk to calm myself.

Follow the way-instructions of the assistant and imagine you do what it says. But your sense of orientation is pretty bad and you cannot deal with instructions involving 'North', 'West', 'South', 'East'. So if that comes up, ask for more details. [instruction 3 of 5]
location
Where are you departing from?
I am not sure where I am, I'm lost
location
Where do you need to go?
near 5th and Main

DetailedWalkingInstructions: Turn right on El Camino Real and walk towards the Target.
Walk for 5 blocks, turn right onto Castro St right after you pass a library
Walk for 3 blocks and turn left at the Irish pub. You will pass several restaurants.
Your destination will be on the left besides the ice cream store.
WalkingInstructions: Turn right on El Camino Real
After 5 blocks, turn right on Castro St.
Walk for 3 blocks and turn left at the pub
Your destination will be on the left.

Scenario.UserTask: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk System bot (darker yellow boxes in the dialogue). Do not end the dialogue before the MTurk System bot (not the assistant) has told you to do so.
Scenario.WizardTask:
Follow the flow charts and help the user. Some facts you should be aware of: 

* At the beginning of the conversation, the user's location is Broadway and Main
* At the beginning of the conversation it is 1pm

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
